# Autogenerated from https://gist.github.com/s-williams/8b6a564218d82ed5895ff9379145f336
# Restore a tags capital to its rightful place as defined in its country history file
country_event = {
	id = 1000
	title = "Restore our capital"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000"
	picture = "administration"

    trigger = {
        tag = ADB
        owns = 270
        270 = {
            is_capital = no
        }
        NOT = {
            has_country_flag = rejected_capital_restoration
        }
    }

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 3 }
	
	option = {
		name = "Excellent"
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
        }
		capital = 270
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "No"	
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
        }	
		set_country_flag = rejected_capital_restoration
	}
}

        }
    }

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 3 }
	
	option = {
		name = "Excellent"
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
        }
		capital = 839
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "No"	
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
        }	
		set_country_flag = rejected_capital_restoration
	}
}

		set_country_flag = rejected_capital_restoration
	}
}

        }
    }

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 3 }
	
	option = {
		name = "Excellent"
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
        }
		capital = 451
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "No"	
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
        }	
		set_country_flag = rejected_capital_restoration
	}
}

	id = 1138
	title = "Restore our capital"
	desc = "EVTDESC1000"
	picture = "administration"

    trigger = {
        tag = ROH
        owns = 794
        794 = {
            is_capital = no
        }
        NOT = {
            has_country_flag = rejected_capital_restoration
        }
    }

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 3 }
	
	option = {
		name = "Excellent"
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
        }
		capital = 794
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "No"	
        ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
        }	
		set_country_flag = rejected_capital_restoration
	}
}
